title: Companies Upend Plans on Covid-19 Vaccines and Office Returns, Again
sub_head: More employers say workers can now stay home for months longer, while some pause vaccine requirements as the Biden administration’s directive is blocked
body:
Companies knew to expect pandemic surprises heading into winter. They just keep coming.
The Biden administration’s vaccine mandate is in limbo. The threat of the Omicron variant is still being studied. International travel is getting more restrictive again.
